introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: 4Tparts B2B Platform ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our B2B e-commerce platform.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including: name, email address, company name, VAT/BTW number, business address, phone number, and payment information.

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic.content: When you access our platform, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and cookies installed on your device.

business.title: Business Information
business.content: As a B2B platform, we collect business-related information such as company registration details, VAT numbers, order history, and transaction data necessary for invoice generation and tax compliance.

purposes.title: We use the information we collect to:
purposes.item1: Process and fulfill your orders and invoices
purposes.item2: Verify your business credentials and VAT registration
purposes.item3: Communicate with you about products, services, and promotions
purposes.item5: Comply with legal obligations and tax requirements
purposes.item6: Prevent fraud and maintain platform security

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.service: With service providers who perform services on our behalf (payment processors, shipping companies, email services)
dataSharing.legal: When required by law or to respond to legal processes
dataSharing.business: In connection with a business transfer, merger, or acquisition
dataSharing.consent: With your consent or at your direction

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.intro: As a European business, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You have the right to:
gdpr.erase: Request erasure of your personal data
gdpr.restrict: Restrict processing of your personal data
gdpr.object: Object to processing of your personal data
gdpr.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@4Tparts.com

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our platform.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law (e.g., tax and accounting requirements).

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to 4Tparts B2B Platform. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of our B2B e-commerce platform. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: Our platform is intended solely for business-to-business transactions. You must be a registered business entity with a valid VAT/BTW number to use our services. You represent that you have the authority to bind your business to these Terms.

verification.title: Verification
verification.content: All accounts are subject to verification. We reserve the right to reject or suspend any account if we cannot verify your business credentials or VAT registration.

responsibility.title: Account Responsibility
responsibility.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

placement.title: Order Placement
placement.content: All orders are subject to acceptance by us. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including product availability, errors in pricing or product information, or fraud concerns.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: All prices are listed in Euros (EUR) and exclude VAT unless otherwise stated. Prices are subject to change without notice. The price applicable to your order is the price displayed at the time of order placement.

minimum.title: Minimum Order Quantities
minimum.content: Certain products may have minimum order quantities. These requirements will be clearly indicated on the product page.

invoice.title: Invoice Payment
invoice.content: Payment is made via invoice with standard payment terms of 30 days from the invoice date, unless otherwise agreed in writing. Late payments may be subject to interest charges.

vat.title: VAT and Taxes
vat.content: As a B2B transaction within the EU, VAT will be applied according to applicable regulations. You are responsible for providing accurate VAT information. Reverse charge mechanisms may apply for intra-EU transactions.

policy.title: Shipping Policy
policy.content: Shipping costs are calculated based on weight and destination. Delivery times are estimates and not guaranteed. Risk of loss passes to you upon delivery to the carrier.

delay.title: Delays
delay.content: We are not liable for delays caused by circumstances beyond our control, including but not limited to carrier delays, customs clearance, or force majeure events.

policy.title: Return Policy
policy.content: Returns are accepted within 14 days of delivery for defective or incorrect products. Products must be unused and in original packaging. Custom orders are not eligible for return.

process.title: Return Process
process.content: To initiate a return, contact our support team at support@4Tparts.com. Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer unless the return is due to our error.

limited.title: Limited Warranty
limited.content: Products are provided with manufacturer warranties where applicable. We make no additional warranties beyond those provided by the manufacturer.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, OUR PLATFORM AND PRODUCTS ARE PROVIDED 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES. OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU FOR THE SPECIFIC PRODUCT OR SERVICE GIVING RISE TO THE CLAIM.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on our platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of 4Tparts or its licensors and is protected by copyright and trademark laws. You may not use our intellectual property without prior written consent.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms, fraudulent activity, or any other reason at our sole discretion. Upon termination, you must pay all outstanding invoices.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Belgium. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Belgium.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes via email. Your continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
